flawed_nl_solution:
There are 4/5 * 2300 = <<4/5*2300=1480>>1480 books in English at the library.
Out of these books, only 3/5 * 1480 = <<3/5*1480=888>>888 were published inside the country.
So there are 1480 - 888 = <<1480-888=592>>592 books in English published outside of the country.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1840, not 1480. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
